title: Riot please fix your client.
body:
I'm running this game with a high end computer. Never had issues with load screens or client errors.

First 2 games the load screen froze on me. This is literally the only game that i play that when a load screen breaks, it bricks my entire computer.

2 losses.

Im not playing this game until this is fixed. This is ridiculous. This is why there is a PTR.
